evidence.text: the Administrative Procedure Act, 5 U.S.C. § 701, et seq.

The Impoundment Control Act of 1974 explicitly prohibits the Executive Branch from impounding appropriated funds without following certain procedures. 2 U.S.C. § 681 et seq.; Aids Vaccine Advoc. Coalition, 2025 WL 752378, at *14.
Plaintiffs have a non-statutory right of action to declare unlawful and enjoin Defendants’ ultra vires actions.
